des:
Discover Daily by Perplexity is a short-form podcast exploring the top headlines in innovation, science, and culture from our Discover feed.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
